Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1966...
Injured on 5/13/1966 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Traded from New York (N) to Pittsburgh on 1/31/1968 (Going to PIT: C J. Bench, LF S. Braun, P R. Klimkowski, P B. Moose, P G. Nolan. Going to NYM: LF W. Stargell, P B. Veale)...
Injured on 8/29/1968 with a Blister On Finger, out for 6 days...
Injured on 5/18/1969 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 9/4/1971 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 5-6 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/26/1972, off Dick Hughes (CHC)...
Earned first career win on 5/29/1972...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1977, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Injured on 4/1/1979 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 8/3/1979 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for entire career...
